name: places/ChIJ53hcv4X2wokRoOgh-oD_FY0
formattedAddress: 800 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 800 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10032-7460, USA

originalText.text: I would definitely recommend this law firm to any one who needs a good injury attorney. Michael and Mariel were phenomenal with handling my lawsuit. They were consistently calling and texting me to remind me about my appointments and any meetings I had with them. They answered all questions that my family and I had throughout my lawsuit and treated me very well. I am satisfied with how my case turned out and am please to have met these two wonderful people who did what they could during a difficult time in my life.

text.text: I would definitely recommend this law firm to any one who needs a good injury attorney. Michael and Mariel were phenomenal with handling my lawsuit. They were consistently calling and texting me to remind me about my appointments and any meetings I had with them. originalText.text: If I could give 10 stars I most certainly would! Michael and Mariel are angels and worked hard during my daughter’s lawsuit. They kept contact and would always answer my calls or text messages. Mariel had answers to any questions I had and both explained the process for my daughter and I. They reminded us of all appointments through texts, calls and even letters. They would ask how my daughter was, how she was feeling which really meant a lot being that she went through so much. Michael and Mariel are like a second family and we am so blessed and thankful they took on our case and fought hard for the best possible outcome. Thank You!

originalText.text: Both Mr. Michael Maggiano and his son Joseph Maggiano are highly trained professionals that work tirelessly for their clients. It can be highly stressful when searching for the right lawyer, but look no further, this group will instantly put your mind at ease. Both their attention to detail and years of experience will ensure you get the results you desire without any of the unwanted stress.

originalText.text: From the moment you walk into the office of Maggiano DiGirolamo & Lizzi, there is a sense of professionalism. All of the attorneys and paralegals are very caring and knowledgeable.

text.text: From the moment you walk into the office of Maggiano DiGirolamo & Lizzi, there is a sense of professionalism. All of the attorneys and paralegals are very caring and knowledgeable.

originalText.text:
I have personally used Michael Maggiano’s Fort Lee, NJ office for a serious  injury I sustained when i was struck by a motor vehicle as a pedestrian. This happened some years ago but the service,  compassion , defending your rights and well-being is something that I will
Never forget. Mr. Maggiano  goes above and beyond what I could have ever expected. He leaves nothing behind when  pursuing all legal and financial issues for his clients. I have recommended numerous people to Mr. Maggaino and his firm over the years. Unfortunately my daughter sustained a recent mouth/ jaw injury while dining at a local restaurant,  she suffered jaw pain, broken teeth, jaw locking and developed migraine headaches from biting down on a forgiven object that was in her food. I took my daughter and met with Mr. Maggiano and his son. They did a outstanding job protecting my daughters rights and secured a settlement for her. I highly recommend Him and his firm. They take the worrying away and handle every aspect of the case. This leaves you time to heal and recover while he has your back protecting your rights and state of mind. Excellent service from a true professional!
